state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to make an effort to take a trip west. Next, go to the north. And then, attempt to venture west. After that, move south. With that done, attempt to move west. That done, head south. And then, travel west. Then, make an attempt to take a trip south. Then, try to venture south. With that done, go to the east. And then, make an attempt to take a trip east. Following that, travel north. Then, travel west. And then, make an attempt to head south. Then, pick-up the coin from the floor of the cookhouse. And once you've done that, you win! -= Dish-Pit =- You are in a dish-pit. A standard one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Dish-Pit =-0/1
